option.name: Sampling interval
option.description:
Time interval between two attempts to read this channel.
Removing or omitting the samling interval parameter disables sampling on this channel.

option.name: Sampling group
option.description:
For grouping channels. All channels with the same samplingGroup and same samplingInterval are in one group.
The purpose of samplingGroups is to improve the drivers performance â€“ if possible.

option.name: Listening
option.description: Determines if this channel shall passively listen for incoming value changes from the driver.

option.name: Logging interval
option.description:
Time difference until this channel is logged again.
Setting the time interval to -1 or omitting the logging interval parameter disables logging on this channel.

option.name: Value length
option.description:
Only used if valueType == BYTE_ARRAY or STRING.
Determines the maximum length of the byte array or string.

option.name: Scaling factor
option.description: Is used to scale a value read by a driver or set by an application. The value read by an driver is multiplied with the scalingFactor and a value set by an application is divided by the scalingFactor. Possible values are e.g.: 1.0 4.94147E-9 -2.4

option.name: Value offset
option.description: Is used to offset a value read by a driver or set by an application. The offset is added to a value read by a driver and subtracted from a value set by an application.

option.name: Unit
option.description:
Physical unit of this channel.
For information only (info can be accessed by an app or driver).
